Label: 12-sec avg vector magnetic field at 4-sec intervals - C. T. Russell (UCLA)

DatasetLink.Title: ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server
DatasetLink.Text: Data at 60-s and 4-s resolution also available through IGPP

VariableDescription.Name: BX
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Magnetic Field X Comp. - Spacecraft axes (near GSE): 12-sec avg at 4-sec intervals
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISEE
#     SOURCE_NAME                     ISEE2>International Sun-Earth Explorer 2
#     DISCIPLINE                      Solar Physics>Heliospheric Physics
#                                     Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     DATA_TYPE                       4sec>4sec magnetic field
#     DESCRIPTOR                      MFI>3-axis fluxgate magnetometer averages
#     FILE_NAMING_CONVENTION          source_datatype_descriptor
#     DATA_VERSION                    2
#     PI_NAME                         C. T. Russell
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  UCLA
#     TEXT                            C. T. Russell (IEEE Trans. Geoscience Electronics, GE-16, 239-242, 1978). This                         
#                                      publication is available online at http://www-ssc.igpp.ucla.edu/personnel/russell/papers/ISEE_fluxgate
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   ISEE
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  isee2_4sec_mfi
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 isee2_4sec_mfi_00000000_v02
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      12-sec avg vector magnetic field at 4-sec intervals
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 12-sec avg at 4-sec intervals
#     NSSDC_ID                        SPMS-00669
#     OLD_NSSDC_ID                    77-102A-04Z
#     GENERATED_BY                    Tim Eastman
#     GENERATION_DATE                 February 2011
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Dr. C. T. Russell
#     LINK_TEXT                       Data at 60-s and 4-s resolution also available through IGPP
#                                     at UCLA for entire ISEE mission
#                                     (Oct. 22, 1977 through Sept. 25, 1987).
#     LINK_TITLE                      ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www-ssc.igpp.ucla.edu/forms/isee/
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/ISEE2/MAG/PT4S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Default time
#  2. Magnetic Field X Comp. - Spacecraft axes (near GSE): 12-sec avg at 4-sec intervals
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 23:04:43 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Magnetic Field X Comp. - Spacecraft axes (near GSE): 12-sec avg at 4-sec intervals
#
EPOCH                         BX_(SC)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms             nT
22-10-1977 19:54:12.871       3.97970
